project_descr: The objective of the Project is to increase the use of energy-efficient (EE) electric appliances and lighting by the residential and public sectors

outputs.output_descr: The Project will accelerate a market transformation by addressing the identified technical, human resources and governance barriers currently limiting the effectiveness of Energy Efficiency policy
